Pro tip: Don't try to build new Ethereum, just build on Ethereum.

Bitcoin is gold mining. Coordinate resources, expend energy, find gold.   Ethereum is the bond market. Stake capital for a period of time, receive more capital later in return.   Gold marketcap: $7 Trillion Global bond market: $82 Trillion
